channel.title: New Year on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in New Year on Blowfish

item.title: Greetings For New Year 2016
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
Greetings For New Year 2016

Dear Friends,

This year whatever you want to get more start sharing that in your best capacity.

– Want money? Share yours with underprivileged. – Want knowledge? Share yours with those who need it most. – Want love? Open your heart and empathise with those who are in need of care, orphans, lonely etc.

item.title: Greetings For New Year 2015
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
Greetings For New Year 2015

Dear Friend,

I would like to wish you a healthy, rewarding and productive new year 2015 & Mary Christmas.
